sentence.Network_en: The medical term for this condition is " intermittent claudication. "

sentence.Network_en: The onset of claudication had been on average 7.5 months previous.

sentence.Network_en: About 10 percent of people with PAD have intermittent claudication.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约10%的PAD患者会出现间歇性跛行的症状.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin claudicatio(n-), from the verb claudicare 'to limp', from claudus 'lame'

means.word_mean: 1. disability of walking due to crippling of the legs or feet
